title: Wildflowers
lyrics:
'Cause I found my place
Butterflies and rainbows in your eyes
My mind won't wonder
You're perfection
My treasure
'Cause you're driving me crazy

Let's grow

Let's grow

Like wildflowers



Let's grow, baby, let's grow

Higher

Till we lose all control

Let's grow, baby, let's grow

Higher

Till we lose all control



Know the feeling of wanting and not having

Making mistakes and fixing my bad habits

I know of sadness that none of ya can imagine

Been devastated but greatness just comes with patience

I've seen it all, got scars turning to fashion

My passion got no destruction, abandon the past

We feeding the masses, bastards

Catch me if you can, I'm Mick Doohan, I'm winning a lot

Swinging my locks, my voice box unorthodox

Unlock the good vibes to set your night on fire

Swing it left and right

Drop it low, come along, dance with girl, oh go



'Cause I found my place

Butterflies and rainbows in your eyes

My mind won't wonder

You're perfection

My treasure

'Cause you're driving me crazy

Let's grow

Let's grow

Like wildflowers



Let's grow, baby, let's grow

Higher

Till we lose all control

Let's grow, baby, let's grow

Higher

Till we lose all control



Wildflowers

Don't stop it for me, girl, don't rob me now

Don't stop it for me



Girl, I love the way you baikoko

The way you dance you don't see the people

No way, till the morning, yeah, we on the dance floor

Darling

You deserve the world and everyman can see

Tell me your fantasies, let me get on your frequency

So let me serenade ya till you love sick

It's not about the paper, but the feelings, yeah ya



Let's grow, baby, let's grow

Higher

Till we lose all control

Let's grow, baby, let's grow

Higher

Till we lose all control



Wildflowers

Let's grow, baby, let's grow

Let's grow, baby, let's grow

Wildflowers, wildflowers

Wildflowers
